Title: Israelis more likely to be 'religious nationalists' than citizens...
Description: An international survey conducted by the Pew Research Center found that one of every three Jews in Israel supports making Jewish religious law the state law for the country's Jewish population. Nearly half of all Muslims in Israel support making sharia the state law for Muslims

Title: We're living with uncertainty and we want closure'

Title: My message to Israelis: Fight until the last captive is freed. O...

Title: We fully contribute to Israel, and we expect to get our boy back...

Title: Israel pledges to allow rebuilding of Gaza Strip as part of cease...
Description: The cease-fire and hostage release agreement with Hamas is paving the way for significant humanitarian aid and the rebuilding of vital infrastructure in Gaza: Israel will let 600 trucks of food enter daily, and Egyptian construction companies will build roads, schools and hospitals

Title: Most settler violence complaints by Palestinians are closed witho...
Description: According to NGO Yesh Din, only 3 percent of 1,701 investigations ended in convictions. The Israeli human rights organization also found that police complaints about settler violence filed by Palestinians have plunged since Itamar Ben-Gvir's appointment as national security minister

Title: High-profile terrorists are among 735 Palestinian prisoners to be...
